sentences.sContent: The detailed assessment of the latest census will be ready in three months.
sentences.sCn: 有关最新人口普查的详细评估工作将在3个月内就绪。

phrases.pCn: 人口统计局，人口调查局；人口普查局

remMethod.val: cens (评估) + us → 评估我们 → 人口普查

trans.tranOther: an official process of counting a country’s population and finding out about the people
